We previously committed to holding the seat through Round 11 and then making a prompt decision in Round 12 among active applicants if still unmatched. In Round 11, Student_E is only TALKing, so we should reaffirm we are unmatched and restate the Round 12 plan, encouraging an early Round 12 APPLY. No acceptance decision is triggered yet.

conversation.message:
Dear School_C Admissions,

As advised, I’m applying immediately at the start of Round 12. School_C remains my first choice, and I am fully available.

If offered admission, I will accept immediately and commit to enrolling at School_C.

Thank you for your prompt reconsideration in this round.

Sincerely,
Student_E
conversation.thought: Only School_C remains unmatched, and it is my #1 true choice. School_C explicitly instructed me to submit an [APPLY] at the start of Round 12 for prompt reconsideration if they were still unmatched. Given the school’s stated plan to decide among actively applying candidates now, I should apply immediately, clearly reaffirming first-choice commitment and readiness to accept right away.

conversation.message:
Dear Student_E,

Thank you for applying promptly at the start of Round 12 and for your continued commitment to School_C.

As we indicated, we are making a decision in this round among actively applying candidates. We are pleased to offer you admission to School_C for our remaining seat. We appreciate your persistence and clear intent to enroll.

Welcome to School_C.

Sincerely,
School_C Admissions

[ACCEPT]
conversation.thought: We have quota 1 and are still unmatched in Round 12. Our true priority list ranks Student_E above Student_C (and we prefer to keep seat open earlier for B/A/D, but none have applied now). Student_E has consistently signaled School_C is first choice and will commit immediately, reducing risk of losing the seat. Given the Round 12 commitment to decide among active applicants and only Student_E is in the inbox, accepting maximizes expected outcome versus holding out further with no guarantee of higher-priority applicants arriving later.
